results.content: This course is very basic and short.
results.content_html: This course is very basic and short.

results.content: It is not a course that makes you an expert in Doctrine, to be honest. Instead it shows you the very basics. But it is definitely for the good. It shows you the shoulders to climb up to become a giant :-)
results.content_html: It is not a course that makes you an expert in Doctrine, to be honest. Instead it shows you the very basics. But it is definitely for the good. It shows you the shoulders to climb up to become a giant :-)

results.content: Really gave me a head start in a project I was keen to progress.
results.content_html: Really gave me a head start in a project I was keen to progress.

results.content:
The course was a quick but adequate introduction to Doctrine. I feel that I now know enough to include it in a project so I can learn more by actually using it. If he made a follow-up course going into more detail I would definitely buy it.

I wish Chris would use a larger font in his IDE - reading the code can be challenging even with the enlarged key logger at the bottom of the screen.

response.content: Hi Patrick, thanks for the feedback! I'm always looking to improve my courses so let me know if there are any specific areas you want more detail on and I'll add additional lessons.
response.content_html: Hi Patrick, thanks for the feedback! I'm always looking to improve my courses so let me know if there are any specific areas you want more detail on and I'll add additional lessons.

results.content: The course is very basic. Many passages take many things for granted and do not provide solutions for errors
